channel.title: Walk somewhere = skull?
channel.description: How would i make it so if you walk in a certain area it gives you a certain head icon(skull). or it that possible?

item.title: Walk somewhere = skull?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Gh0st Jr:

How would i make it so if you walk in a certain area it gives you a certain head icon(skull). or it that possible?

Add this Method:

public void iconarea() { if (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) { InArenas = true; } else { InArenas = false; } }

Replace the '####'s with the Area coordinates you want to have a skull Icon in.

Then in your process(), add this:

if (iconarea()) { headIcon = 1; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Change the ‘1’ in ‘headIcon = 1;’ to whatever you like to change the HeadIcon.

Read full topic
